{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Wi-Fi USB Adapter for LG TV |caption2 = |pp = http://www.lg.com/us/tv-audio-video/accessories/LG-tv-accessories-AN-WF100.jsp |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = LG |model = AN-WF100 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = October 31, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/LG_AN-WF100 |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 043e |device_id = 3001 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = BEJ-WF100 |icid = 2703H-WF100 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:E0:91,E8:5B:5B |chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4323; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/22/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 719192578838 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B003F9HH2W |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Used with a variety of LG HDTVs. *"P/N:141852220008J" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *"E85B5Bâ€¦" and "WN8522B 2-LF-19" is silkscreened on the [[:File:AN WF100 LG.jpg|sticker]]. :[[Arcadyan WN8522B]] (FCC ID: RAX-WN8522B) This device has two internal U.FL connectors. {{see also|LG AN-WF500|Arcadyan}} {{WiFiCert|WFA7996|02/04/2010}} === Compatible TV models === 2010-2011 *LED LCD TV: LW6500, LW5700, LW5600, LV5500, :LV5400, LV3700, LE55, LE54, LE7 series *LCD TV: LK550, LD8, LD7, LD6, LD5 series *Plasma TV: PZ950, PZ750, PZ550, PK7, PK9, PX9 series *Projectors: HX350Y, HW300 :For 2014 TVs, please see [[LG AN-WF500]] 
AN-WF100 is a Wi-Fi USB dongle that can only 
be used on any of the following LG TV model:

PDP: 50PK750/950/760/790, 
60PK550/650/750/950 Series 
 
LCD: LA50/LA55/LA60,
LE55/LE70/LE80/LE90/ 
LEX7/LEX8/LEX9 Series
